name: test-automation-framework
description: Reusable Playwright test automation framework template for UI, API, and integration testing

scripts.check:all: npm run type:check && npm run lint
scripts.test:encryption:dev: cross-env ENV=dev SKIP_BROWSER_INIT=true npx playwright test tests/encryption
scripts.test:encryption:uat: cross-env ENV=uat SKIP_BROWSER_INIT=true npx playwright test tests/encryption
scripts.test:ui:dev: cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/ui
scripts.test:ui:uat: cross-env ENV=uat npx playwright test tests/ui
scripts.test:api:dev: cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/api
scripts.test:api:uat: cross-env ENV=uat npx playwright test tests/api
scripts.test:db:dev: cross-env ENV=dev SKIP_BROWSER_INIT=true npx playwright test tests/db
scripts.test:db:uat: cross-env ENV=uat SKIP_BROWSER_INIT=true npx playwright test tests/db
scripts.test:all:dev: cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test tests
scripts.test:all:uat: cross-env ENV=uat npx playwright test tests
